<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Typewriter effect for hero title
    const typewriterElement = document.querySelector('.typewriter');
    if (typewriterElement) {
        const text = typewriterElement.textContent;
        typewriterElement.textContent = '';
        typewriterElement.style.borderRight = '2px solid #3b82f6';
        
        let i = 0;
        function typeWriter() {
            if (i < text.length) {
                typewriterElement.textContent += text.charAt(i);
                i++;
                setTimeout(typeWriter, 100);
            } else {
                // Blinking cursor effect
                setInterval(() => {
                    typewriterElement.style.borderRight = 
                        typewriterElement.style.borderRight === 'none' ? 
                        '2px solid #3b82f6' : 'none';
                }, 500);
            }
        }
        setTimeout(typeWriter, 500);
    }
    
    // Matrix rain effect (subtle)
    function createMatrixRain() {
        const matrix = document.createElement('div');
        matrix.className = 'matrix-rain';
        matrix.style.cssText = `
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            pointer-events: none;
            z-index: -1;
            opacity: 0.03;
        `;
        
        const chars = '01ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚µã‚¿ãƒŠãƒãƒãƒ¤ãƒ©ãƒ¯ã‚¬ã‚¶ãƒ€ãƒãƒ‘ã‚¤ã‚­ã‚·ãƒãƒ‹ãƒ’ãƒŸãƒªãƒ°ã‚®ã‚¸ãƒ‚ãƒ“ãƒ”ã‚¦ã‚¯ã‚¹ãƒ„ãƒŒãƒ•ãƒ ãƒ¦ãƒ«ã‚°ã‚ºãƒ…ãƒ–ãƒ—ã‚¨ã‚±ã‚»ãƒ†ãƒãƒ˜ãƒ¡ãƒ¬ãƒ±ã‚²ã‚¼ãƒ‡ãƒ™ãƒšã‚ªã‚³ã‚½ãƒˆãƒãƒ›ãƒ¢ãƒ¨ãƒ­ãƒ²ã‚´ã‚¾ãƒ‰ãƒœãƒãƒ´ãƒƒãƒ³';
        
        for (let i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
            const column = document.createElement('div');
            column.style.cssText = `
                position: absolute;
                top: -100%;
                font-family: monospace;
                font-size: 14px;
                color: #00ff41;
                animation: matrixFall ${5 + Math.random() * 10}s linear infinite;
                left: ${Math.random() * 100}%;
            `;
            
            let text = '';
            for (let j = 0; j < 20; j++) {
                text += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)] + '<br>';
            }
            column.innerHTML = text;
            matrix.appendChild(column);
        }
        
        document.body.appendChild(matrix);
    }
    
    // Add matrix animation CSS
    const style = document.createElement('style');
    style.textContent = `
        @keyframes matrixFall {
            to { transform: translateY(100vh); }
        }
    `;
    document.head.appendChild(style);
    
    // Uncomment to enable matrix effect
    // createMatrixRain();
    
    // Terminal hover effects
    const terminalCards = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-card-terminal, .github-terminal');
    terminalCards.forEach(card => {
        card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(-2px) scale(1.02)';
        });
        card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
            this.style.transform = 'translateY(0) scale(1)';
        });
    });
    
    // Newsletter form terminal effect
    const newsletterForm = document.querySelector('.newsletter-form-terminal form');
    if (newsletterForm) {
        newsletterForm.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const btn = this.querySelector('.terminal-submit');
            const input = this.querySelector('.terminal-input');
            
            btn.textContent = 'PROCESSING...';
            btn.style.background = '#f59e0b';
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                btn.textContent = 'SUCCESS!';
                btn.style.background = '#22c55e';
                input.value = 'Thanks for subscribing!';
                input.disabled = true;
            }, 1500);
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                btn.textContent = 'SUBMIT';
                btn.style.background = '#3b82f6';
                input.value = '';
                input.disabled = false;
                input.placeholder = 'your-email@domain.com';
            }, 4000);
        });
    }
});
</script>
